resumeContent.title: Caleb Masters
resumeContent.summary: Frontend engineer with 10+ years experience building pixel-perfect, component based, mobile first, conversion-generating web experiences. Natural propensity toward community building, curiosity driven technical exploration, and problem solving. Hobby collector.

experience.company: Newfold (Formerly Endurance International Group) - Bluehost, Hostgator, addt'l.
responsibilities: Devleloped scalable & easily maintainable stateless functional components in React utilizing Contentful for content management
Collaborated with design and backend teams to deliver rapid, accessible, semantic, cross-browser compliant, end-user focused, websites in an agile workflow
Worked with sys-ops & backend teams to deploy to AWS mirrors with devleopment, stakeholder, & production builds

Ensured the quality of our codebase by establishing best practice coding ownership standards and demonstrating those values when participating in peer-to-peer code reviews, resulting in continuously improving code and value to our stakeholders
Encouraged and instructed jr. developers, assisted on-boarding of new hires, and helped instill a culture of open communication and fellowship which helped lower our attrition rate

Led the charge to implement Test Driven Development into our development standards. Created unit tests using Enzyme/Jest, Mocha, & React Testing Library ensuring 100% code coverage for every component I built
Implemented Monetate & Optimizley/Optimizley Full-stack A/B campaigns for our marketing conversion success testing

resumeContent.references: Professional and Personal references available upon request
